channel.title: I need a working compiler please!
channel.description:
Ok so when i try to compile my server i get the message... [code]The system cannot find the path specified.Press any key to continue . . .[/code] my current code is..
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files \Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
i am willing to use teamviewer so if you wanna tv me with a working code send me a pm or post on here!

item.title: I need a working compiler please!
item.dc:creator: @fatal_chemical fatal chemical
item.description:
@fatal_chemical wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:11, topic:380220”]some systems it is /Program Files (x86)/

this could be ur problem if ur on a 64x processor =P could be why the space is in there too.

go to C:\ and see if you have a folder with (x86) if not it must be your java version is wrong o.O[/quote]

could your probally teamviewer me please i just want this fixed it will be a great help if you do.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a working compiler please!

item.title: I need a working compiler please!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

some systems it is /Program Files (x86)/

this could be ur problem if ur on a 64x processor =P could be why the space is in there too.

go to C:\ and see if you have a folder with (x86) if not it must be your java version is wrong o.O
